remarks.format:
## Remarks Use the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocationCollection> class to iterate through a collection of <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocation> objects, which represent the resources for which location-specific configuration settings are defined. <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocationCollection> is the type returned by the <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.Locations%2A> property.
> [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocationCollection> class might not reference the collection of <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocation> objects in the order that they are specified in the configuration file.
## Examples In the following code example, the Web configuration for the application `MySampleApp` is loaded, and the locations defined in this configuration are displayed by iterating through the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocationCollection> object returned by the <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.Locations%2A> property.
